Valeriana elabora polleras y mantas de vicuña, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para la compra de una máquina de coser para aumentar su producción y así mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Valeriana es tener un taller de costura en su domicilio.
Es la doceava vez con IMPRO y la quinta con Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Valeriana makes skirts and blankets out of vicuña wool. She lives in her own house that has a brick exterior and cement floors. Her home is located in the District of Bajo Irpavi in the city of La Paz.

Valeriana produces skirts and blankets from vicuña wool so that she can generate income to cover expenses such as food, electricity, and water. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a sewing machine so that she can increase production, generate more income, and improve her quality of life.

Her dream is to have a sewing workshop in her home. This is the 12th time Valeriana has worked with IMPRO and the fifth time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy baked goods to sell.

loans.name: Al-Azhar Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Azhar. It consists of five ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Ghna is 23 years old, married and has children who live in Taiz. She has been selling sheep. She applied for a youth loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy livestock for her business. She hopes to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to buy livestock for her business.

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
El Joven Cristhian  tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Como proviene de una familia que se dedica netamente a la fabricación y ventas de artesanía él decidió salir con su padre a vender sus productos, en poco tiempo logró juntar un poco de capital para empezar a comprar más variedad de artículos, como ser hamacas, frazadas edredones, etc. y llevar a vender por la capital del país, Asunción, donde ya tiene una buena clientela formada. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse una motocicleta  la cual utiliza para realizar sus ventas y mantener la buena clientela.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos y quiere cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristhian is a young man who is 22 years of age. He is single and lives in the city of Carapeguá. Since he comes from a family that is entirely devoted to producing and selling handicrafts, Cristhian decided that he would help his father sell these products. Over a short period of time, he was able to accumulate a small amount of capital so that he could begin buying a wider variety of products such as hammocks, blankets, quilts, and other items that he could sell in the Paraguayan capital of Asunción where he has a well-established clientele. Thanks to his efforts, he was able to buy a motorcycle that he uses for making sales and visiting his customers.

Cristhian is requesting a loan so that he can buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and bed sheets. He has many orders for these products, so he wants to keep his customers satisfied.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and bed sheets.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is 28 years old and single. To make a living, Richard makes and sells snack foods like crackes. Richard has been engaged in his business for two years and earns PHP 3,600 a month for these activities. Richard is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000, which will be used to purchase additional cooking ingredients. Recently, Richard joined GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson's main source of income comes from his gardening business. He is 56 years old, married with 7 kids. He is from Camanga, Tukuran and has been  gardening for seven years, earning an amount of 6,550 PHP a month. In 2011, Wilson joined GDMPC. Wilson is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Yusufjon

texts.ru:
Юсуфджон житель города Дангара. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. Жена Юсуфджона домохозяйка. Его старший сын учится в школе, а трое других (сын и двое дочерей) маленькие. Юсуфджон имеет средне - специальное образование. Он уже десять лет как работает шафером. Юсуфджон уравновешенный и трудолюбивый человек. Помимо своей работы он занимается растениеводством. Он сеет пшеницу и выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается более тринадцати лет. 
Юсуфджон берет кредит для закупа семян и топлива, чтобы посеять пшеницу и картошку.
texts.en:
Yusufjon is a resident of Dangara.  He is 35 years old and married.  Yusufjon's wife is a homemaker.  His oldest son is in school, but the three others are still too young.   Yusufjon has a specialized secondary level education.  He has been working as a driver for already ten years.  Yusufjon is a level-headed and hardworking man.  Besides his regular job, he is also a farmer.  He grows wheat and vegetables.  He has been in this business for more than 13 years.  

Yusufjon is taking out this loan to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat and potatoes.

loans.use: to buy wheat and potato seed, and fuel

loans.name: Urmila

texts.en: Urmila is a 43-year-old divorced lady living with her parents and brother. She manages a tailoring shop where she stitches dresses like salwar suits (traditional Indian dress), frocks etc. for her customers who give orders for stitching. After the divorce from her husband, she came to her paternal home. She did not want to be a burden on her parents so she started a tailoring shop. She earns only 3,500 INR per month from this business. She planned to purchase two new sewing machines so that she can enlarge her business and take orders from her customers in bulk. Urmila has requested a loan of 25,000 INR to purchase two sewing machines and fabrics. She also wants to hire some work force to help her. She wants to give a good living standard to her family and save some money for their future.

loans.use: to purchase new sewing machines for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Ronne Mar

texts.en: Ronne Mar, 27 years old, is a single entrepreneur from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is earning an income from selling snack food. It started almost two years ago and he earns 3,800 PHP a month. To improve business, he is borrowing 5,000 PHP from GDMPC micro credit, which he just joined recently to obtain more food products to sell. He’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business before long.

loans.use: to obtain more food products to sell.

loans.name: Rahmonali

texts.ru: Рахмонали проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 48 лет. Он живет с женой. У него шестеро детей. Двое его дочерей замужем. Рахмонали занимается растениеводством. У него имеется собственный небольшой участок земли, где он сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности он занимается десять лет. Рахмонали берет кредит для закупа семян пшеницы и топлива, чтобы посеять и получить хороший урожай для продажи.
texts.en:
Rahmonali lives in Dangara.  He is 48 years old and married with six children.  His two daughters are married.  Rahmonali is in the farming business.  He owns a modestly sized plot of land where he raises wheat.  He has been in this business for ten years.  

Rahmonali is taking out this loan to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat in order to reap a good harvest for selling.

loans.use: to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat in order to reap a good harvest for selling

loans.name: Afrah Group

texts.en: This group is called Afrah. It consists of four ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Elham is 26 years old, married and has two children who live in Taiz. She is a housewife who feels comfortable with her family. She applied for a youth loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to buy a TV to use at home.

loans.use: to buy a TV to use at home

loans.name: Dillip Kumar

texts.en: Dillip Kumar is a 23-year-old differently able person living with his parents in a small village named Jajpur in Odisha, India. He owns and manages a variety store where he sells biscuits, hair oil, incense sticks, talcum powder, chocolates and other daily household consumables. He has a plan to expand his business by adding more stock of what he sells and a few new products like detergents, soap, deodorant spray, shampoo, wafers etc. to his shop. He says that doing so will help him increase his monthly income and fulfill his family's daily requirements. Dillip Kumar has applied for a loan of 30,000 INR to purchase more stock of what he sells and to renovate his shop.

loans.use: to pay for renovations and to purchase detergents, soap, deodorant spray, shampoo, wafers etc. for his shop.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 32 years old from Gaza. He is married and has two children. He owns a place in which he sells lemon and olive wood. He asked Ryada for this loan in order to build an attic for wood storage. He hopes that this loan will improve his income.

loans.use: to build an attic for wood storage

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en: Ma. Victoria is 39 years old and lives in Curvada, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur with her three children. For the last five years, she has earned a living by buying and selling various kinds of fruits. She earns about 10,000 PHP a month. In 2010, she joined GDMPC. She is applying for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy more types of fruits to sell. She plans to use the additional income made possible by this loan to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more types of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Kholbibi

texts.ru: Холбиби проживает в Яванском районе. Ей 59 лет. Она вдова. У нее шестеро детей. Холбиби занимается растениеводством. У нее при доме имеется участок земли, где она выращивает овощи и сеет зернобобовые культуры. Этим видом деятельности Холбиби занимается пятнадцать лет. Она берет кредит для посева пшеницы.
texts.en: Kholbibi lives in the Yavan region.  She is 59 years old and a widow with six children.  Kholbibi is in the farming business.  She has a plot of land adjacent to her home where she grows vegetables and leguminous crops.  Kholbibi has been in this business for 15 years.  She is taking out this loan to sow wheat.

loans.use: to sow wheat

loans.name: Altyn

texts.ru: Алтын 56 лет, замужем, вырастила 6 детей. Алтын в качестве основного дохода с 1990 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Алтын в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется очень развитое хозяйство.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алтын обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 бычка и на оставшиеся средства она планирует купить овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Алтын планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины. Целью всей жизни является дать высшее образование что бы они смогли устроить свою жизнь.
texts.en:
Altyn is 56 years old, married, and she raised six children.   Since 1990, their main source of income has been Altyn's livestock business, which she started with 10,000 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today she has a highly developed business.

With an aim to further developing her business, Altyn applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of a bull-calf and, with the remaining funds, sheep, which she will fatten for resale.  

Altyn plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the number of cattle she has.  Her entire life's goal is to give her children higher educations so that they can get established in their own lives.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and sheep

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Тоджинисо целеустремленная женщина. Она всегда старается улучшить условию проживания. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж работает в фермерской хозяйстве, и выращивает зерновые культуры. Тоджинисо несколько лет была без работы и надеялась на доход мужа, однако доход мужа маленький и поэтому она всегда была в финансовом недостатке. Она решила организовать свой бизнес и таким образом найти источник дохода. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tojiniso is a goal-oriented woman.  She is always trying to improve her living conditions.  She is married and she has two children.  Her husband works in farming and grows cereal crops.  For several years Tojiniso was unemployed and relied on her husband's income, which isn't very much, so she was always wanting for money.  

Tojiniso decided to start her own business to create her own source of income.   With this goal in mind, she studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she received her graudation certificate.  She wants to start a business in trading livestock, since she has experience in this field.  She plans to use the profits from the business to provide her children with good educations.  

She is requesting a loan of 1,200 somoni (TJS) to buy cattle and start her business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to start a new business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 29 years old from Gaza. He is married and has two children. He owns a shop for construction equipment rentals.

Mohammad has asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy wood for the shop. He hopes that this loan will help him improve his income.

loans.use: to buy wood for the shop.

loans.name: Muharram

texts.ru: Мухаррам женщина с тонким вкусом и конкретными целями. Она родилась и выросла с сельской местности и имеет большого опыта в сфере скотоводства и земледелия. Ей 34 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети Сабрина и Фариддун еще не совершеннолетние. Ее муж фермер и не справляется с обеспечением семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Мухаррам решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур как картошка, морковь, лук, капуста и т.п, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Muharram is a woman of discriminating taste and she has concrete goals.  She was born and raised in the countryside and she has a great deal of experience with livestock and agriculture.  She is married and has two children.  Her children, Sabrina and Fariddun are still minors.  Her husband is a farmer and isn't able to provide the family with all the necessities, so Muharram decided to help her husband with the family's well-being.

With this aim, she studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she received her graduation certificate.  Now, she is fully capable of starting a business and being successful in her field.  Muharram wants to start a business growing crops such as potatoes, carrots, onions, cabbage, etc., since she has experience with this.  She plans to use the profits from her business to improve their living conditions.  

Muharram is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni (TJS) to buy seed and mineral fertilizers to start her new business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizers to start a new business

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is photographed at his car wash business. He is a single 25-year-old young man. For the past one and a half years he has been operating a car wash located next to the main street where there is good traffic. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him.

Saleh is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing car accessories, car wash equipment, and cleaning materials. This will attract more customers and increase Saleh's income and ensure him a bright future.

loans.use: to buy car accessories, car wash equipment, and cleaning materials for the car wash business.

loans.name: Mark Bryan

texts.en:
Mark Bryan is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is 24 years old. Mark Bryan is single. To make a living, Mark Bryan makes and sales snack foods like crackers. He has been engaged in his business for two years and earns PHP 3,900 a month for these activities. He is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000, which will be used to purchase additional cooking ingredients. 

Mark Bryan joined GDMPC recently. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул 39 лет. Бактыгул в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 1998 году с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Бактыгул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется очень развитое хозяйство, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS).  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бактыгул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку  бычков и овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Бактыгул планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а в этом году хотела бы провести небольшой ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Baktygul is 39 years old.  Her family's main source of income is the livestock business that she started in 1998 with 15,000 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today she has a highly developed business with a monthly income of about 5,000 som (KGS).  With an aim to further developing her business, Baktygul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy bull-calves and sheep, which she will fatten and sell.  

Baktygul plans to invest the profits from the loan in the further development of her business and she would like to do some minor home repairs this year.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and sheep

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора очень красивая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 23 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж Далерчон, очень добрый человек и всегда старается обеспечить семью с хорошим условием. Нигора более 3 месяца занимается изготовлением и продажей разных салатов. Нигора прошла курс «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она очень многому научилась. В дальнейшем Нигора планирует открыть отдельную точку продаж салатов и прием заказов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки разных овощей для приготовления салатов, чтобы развевать  новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nigora is a beautiful and hard-working 23 year old.  She is married and has two children.  Her husband, Dalerchon, is a very kind man who always tries to be a good provider for his family.  

For three months, Nigora has been in business making and selling various kinds of salads.  Nigora went through a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women and received her graduation certificate.  She learned a lot from studying in the course.  In the future, Nigora plans to open a self-contained business location from which she will sell her salads and take special orders.  

In order to develop her business, she is requesting a loan of 500 somoni (TJS) to buy various vegetables for preparing salads.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for making salad

loans.name: Yaser

texts.en: Yaser is a 28-year-old, married man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He owns a house and intends to renew his house. He is sharp, friendly, and a hardworking person. He is requesting a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.ru:
Зухра проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ей 53 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Двое ее сыновей находятся в Российской Федерации. Зухра имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Она более 25 лет работает в школе. Зухра работает по профессии. В свободное от работы время она хочет заняться животноводством, чтобы улучшить финансовое положение в семье. 
Зухра берет кредит для закупа коров и бычков, чтобы заняться купле - продажей крупнорогатого скота. В этом ей будет помогать ее дочь.
texts.en:
Zuhra lives in the J.Rumy region.  She is 53 years old, married, and has three children.  Her two sons are in the Russian Federation.  Zuhra has a higher education in teaching and she has been teaching in a school for more than 25 years.  She wants to get into the business of raising cattle in her spare time in order to improve her family's financial position.  

Zuhra is taking out this loan to buy cows and bulls in order to start her business trading in cattle.  Her daughter will help her with the business.

loans.use: to buy cows and bulls

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфирату 27 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей.  Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и была одной из активных участниц. Более 2 месяца она занимается услугой парикмахера. Ежедневно она обслуживает 10-12 клиентов. В дальнейшем Махфират хочет открыть собственный салон красоты. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки парикмахерского инструмента, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mahfirat is 27 years old.  She is married and has two children.  She studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she was one of the most active participants.  For more than two months, she has been a hairdresser serving 10-12 clients a day.

Going forward, Mahfirat wants to open her own beauty salon.  She is requesting a loan of 500 somoni (TJS) to buy hair styling equipment in order to start her new business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy hair styling equipment

loans.name: Monhbayar

texts.en:
Monhbayar is 39 years old and lives with his parents and sister in a ger in Suhbaatar district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His parents are both retired and stay at home. His sister works for a private company. 

Monhbayar has been running a taxi service within the area since 2010. He has been driving around the city and knows every location and the ways to drive there. He is a very experienced driver and a well-behaved person. 

Monhbayar is now requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to change his car into an eco-friendly electric and gas car for his taxi service. He is a hard-working and welcoming person.

loans.use: to change his car into an eco-friendly electric and gas car for his taxi service

loans.name: Abdulmajid

texts.en: Abdulmajid is a 25-year-old married man and has two children. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating a bookshop and call center which is the main source of his income. He started his business with little capital. He is working hard to continually provide income for the family's everyday expenses. Being an ambitious man, he would like to expand his business so he can provide his clients' needs and get more profit. So, he took out a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy a xerox machine and a laptop for his business.

loans.use: to buy a printer and a laptop for his business.

loans.name: Mercidita

texts.en:
Mercidita is 38 years old, is married and has six dependants. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur.  Mercidita has run a sari-sari (variety) store for two years, earning a monthly income of 16,000 PHP. 

In 2010, Mercidita became a member of GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy items such as milk, diapers, food products, etc. With the loan, Mercidita hopes to boost her income and improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy items such as milk, diapers, food products, etc.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
Felipa is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 60 years old, is widowed and has one child. To make a living, Felipa has planted, harvested,and sold rice for seven years and earns PHP 5,200 a month from these activities. 

In 2008, Felipa joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000, which will be used to pay for the labor costs of rice harvesting. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for the labor costs of rice harvesting.

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зуракан 45 лет, вдова. Мать 2 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Зуракан занимается животноводством. Начатое 4 года назад со стартовой суммы в 50,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство насчитывает на сегодня 1 дойные коровы, 1теленок и и приносит около 30,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от перепродажи скота. Также, Зуракан обрабатывает приемом цветного метала. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зуракан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Зуракан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и в этом году женить сына
texts.en:
Zuurakan is 45 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children.  Her family's source of income is Zuurakan's livestock business.  She started the business four years ago with 50,000 som (KGS), and today she currently has one milk cow and a calf.  The business brings in about 30,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of cattle.  Zuurakan also earns money by processing nonferrous metals.  

With an aim to further developing her business, Zuurakan applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle.  Zuurakan plans to invest the profits from the loan in further expanding her business, and she plans to marry off her son this year.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Ehab

texts.en:
Ehab is a 20-year-old single man. He is employed and earns a low salary which is not enough to cover all his needs. Ehab wants to help his brother who is studying at the university specializing in computer science and wants to complete his studies. 

So Ehab is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing a new laptop for his brother. This will help Ehab's brother to do his homework and reports and help him in his studies. This will ensure a better future for Ehab's brother and improve the family's living conditions.  Ehab is photographed at the store where he will purchase the laptop.

loans.use: To purchase a new laptop

loans.name: Khayriniso

texts.ru: Хайринисо проживает в районе Пяндж. Она замужем. Ей 60 лет. У нее трое детей. Ее дети находятся на заработках за рубежом. Хайринисо берет кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого скота. Она хочет заняться своим бизнесом. Хайринисо намерена заняться животноводством.
texts.en: Khayriniso lives in the Pyandj region.  She is 60 years old and married with three children.  Her children work abroad.  Khayriniso is taking out this loan to buy sheep and goats.  She wants to have her own business and she is intent upon the livestock business.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Rosefely

texts.en:
Rosefely is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 65 years old, is widowed and has one child. To make a living, Rosefely has operated a tailoring business for 23 years and earns 2,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2009, Rosefely joined GDMPC. Rosefely is requesting a loan of 2,800 PHP which will be used to purchase additional fabrics and materials. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics and materials.

loans.name: Karen

texts.ru:
Карен родился и живет  в селе Антарашат ,Сюникской области. Ему 41 лет , женат , имеет сына и дочь по 12 и 13 лет, которые учатся в сельской средней школе.  Карен живет со своей семьей и  с родителями пенсионерами.
 С 2000 года  Карен и его семья занимаются сельскохозяйством в селе Антарашат. В основном по хозяйству Карену  помогают жена и дети.
Карен имеет крупный рогатый скот, кур, имеет так же огород где  выращивает овощи и фрукты. 
У Карена есть еще собственная земля которая служит для пастбища. Карен за год реализует овощи , фрукты ,молоко яйца. Он имеет постоянных клиентов в городе Капане.  Карен  имеет также грузовую машину которую  использует для даставки урожая в Капан и  местные сельские рынки. У Карена тяжелая но прибыльная работа, которая позволяет ему достойно содержать семью. 
Карену нужен кредит на сумму 200,000 Арм. драмм для покупки сена для крупного рогатого скота на зиму .
texts.en:
Karen lives where he was born, in the village of Antarashat in the Siunikskaya district.  He is 41 years old and married.  He has a son and daughter (13 and 14 years old) who study in the village school.  Karen lives with his family and his retired parents.   

Since 2000, Karen and his family have been in the farming business in Antarashat village.  His wife and children help him with the business.  Karen keeps cattle and chickens, and he has a large garden where he grows fruits and vegetables.  He also owns land that he uses for pasture.  Over the course of a year, he sells vegetables, fruit, milk, and eggs.  He owns a commercial vehicle for taking his harvest to market in the nearby villages and in the city of Kapan, where he has regular customers.  His is very hard work, but it's profitable and it allows him to provide properly for his family.

Karen needs a loan of 200,000 Armenian dram (AMD) to buy his cattle hay for the winter.

loans.use: to buy his cattle hay for the winter

loans.name: Dona

texts.ru:
Дона проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 65 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Дона занимается растениеводством. Он в основном сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности Дона занимается с 1980 года. Также вот уже 7 лет он занимается животноводством. Дона разводит мелко - рогатый скот у себя дома. 
Дона берет кредит для закупа овец и семян, чтобы увеличить поголовья скота и посеять пшеницу.
texts.en:
Dona lives in the Jilikul region.  He is 65 years old and married with three children.  Dona is a farmer and he primarily grows wheat.  He has been in this business since 1980.  He has also been in the livestock business for seven years already.  He raises sheep and goats at his home.  

Dona is taking out this loan to buy sheep and seed to increase the size of his herd and to plant wheat.

loans.use: to buy sheep and wheat seed

loans.name: Guljamol

texts.ru: Гулжамол жительница района Кумсангир. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Гулжамол работает на рынке. Она занимается торговлей фруктов. Этим видом деятельности Гулжамол занимается шесть лет. Она берет кредит для приобретения цитрусовых фруктов.
texts.en:
Guljamol lives in the Qumsangir region.  She is 39 yeras old and married with three children.  Her husband is away in the Russian Federation.  Guljamol works at the market selling fruit.  She has been in this business for six years.

She is taking out this loan to buy citrus fruits.

loans.use: to buy citrus fruits

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 28-year-old married man who has been working as a barber for more than 14 years. Husein didn't finish his Intermediate education because of his parents' financial situation. He had to start working early to make his own living and cover his expenses.

Husein is applying for a YOUTH LOAN from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order to renew his shop's tools, machines and furniture that he established in 2004. He is a hard worker with a good reputation. This is his second cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower, with a good standing in his paying back history. His previous loan was invested in improving the shop's decorations and doing necessary maintenance, which resulted in a very impressive impact on customers.

He hopes to expand his working areas in the future, through meeting customers' needs and developing a special facial department.

loans.use: To renew his shop's tools, machines and furniture.

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en: Rosela, of Panduma, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, has been in the business of selling fish for more than 7 years and earns about 3,000 PHP per month. She’s 32 years old now, yet continues to hang on in her fish-selling business to provide adequately for her 4 children. She's been a member of GDMPC since 2008. In order to enhance her business, she is borrowing 5,000 PHP from GDMPC microcredit to purchase more fish to sell. She hopes that someday her children will be successful in their careers.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Theresa

texts.en:
Ma. Theresa is from Militar, Tukuran. She is 42 years old, is married and has four children. To make a living, Ma. Theresa  manages a fish vending business while her husband does the  fishing. She has been in her business for five years and earns PHP 5,000 a month from these activities. 

Recently, Ma. Theresa joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 which will be used to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets

loans.name: Atef

texts.en:
Atef is a 28-year-old single man who lives in Hodeidah, Yemen. He only completed secondary school. He has been operating a bike spare parts shop that has been running for many years. It is the only source of income for the family. He has worked very hard to get ahead in his life. He started his business by repairing motorbikes, and then he started to establish his business and improve his living conditions. 

He has attracted more customers because his business is located in a strategic area and because of the strength of mind which he has enjoyed. Due to the current bad situation in Yemen, he has less profit from his enterprise, and so he took out a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to supply his business with more spare parts and keep his customers coming back.

loans.use: to buy bike spare parts for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie is 47 years old and lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children. Tessie runs a retail store at home. She has been in business for 11 years and earns about 3,000 PHP a month from store operations. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to buy items such as milk, diapers, food products, etc. She joined the GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Tessie hopes to obtain a good return from this investment and acquire enough revolving funds for the business.

loans.use: to buy items such as milks, diapers, food products, etc.

loans.name: Fatema

texts.en:
Fatema is a 52-year-old woman; she is married and the mother to seven sons and one daughter. Some of her sons are employed while others are still school students. Fatema lives in a small village where the population is famous for agriculture and raising livestock .

For the past eight years, Fatema and her husband have been raising and selling sheep and sheep products. This has been a profitable project but they also need more support to cover the family's needs.

Fatema is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and more fodder to feed the sheep that she is raising. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Fatema is photographed with the herd among which are the sheep that she is raising.

loans.use: To buy more sheep and additional fodder to feed the sheep

loans.name: Ma. Grezil

texts.en:
Ma. Grezil, a 39-year-old married mother of four children, lives in Militar, Tukuran. She has been operating a general store selling a variety of food and home-use products in the local community for seven years, earning 3,200 PHP a month. 

Having joined GDMPC this year, Ma. Grezil is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap and toothpaste. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap and toothpaste.

loans.name: Ser-Od

texts.en:
Ser-Od is 49 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children in a ger (traditional Mongolian tent) in the Songinohairhan district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Tuvshinbayar, has worked 32 years at the Mongolian railway company and has just retired. Her son, Monhbat, studies at the university, and her daughter runs her small business in town. 

Ser-Od has been running her business of a small grocery store on their spare land. She is now asking for a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to cover her son's university tuition and dormitory fees. She and her family members are all hardworking and neat people.

loans.use: to cover her son's university tuition and dormitory fees.

loans.name: Gunkeshari

texts.en:
Gun Keshari is 40 years old. She is married and has 2 children, aged 12 and 13. In 2010, she established her tea shop business. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 5 loans from Patan BPW, and used her most recent loan to buy food supplies for her business. In the future, she plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal. Called a chiya pasal, these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Sanu Maiya

texts.en:
Sanu Maiya is 49 years old. She is married and has 2 children, ages 22 and 20. Many years ago, she established her tea shop business. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 4 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy food supplies for her business.  In the future, Sanu Maiya plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal. Called a chiya pasal, these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup.  With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Progress Group

texts.en:
Progress Group is comprised of seven members, all from Teshie. They are Ashorkor, Joyce, Mercy, Mary, Ayorkor, Grace and Eunice, who sell maize (corn), fish, sewing accessories, prepared kenkey (cooked corn paste) and fish meals, cassava, and fruits. They have been together for five months.

Ayorkor is a 45-year-old fish seller, married to Daniel, a 52-year-old carpenter. They have two children, who are adults now and do not depend on their parents. Ayorkor needs GHS 800 to buy more fish to sell to her customers, which will support her husband. This is her fourth loan cycle with ID-Ghana.

She has been in this business for the past six years and was given a loan amount of GHS 300 at her first loan cycle. 

The entire group is borrowing an amount totaling GHS 4,650 to buy more goods to sell to their customers in the community.

loans.use: To buy two boxes of fish, for sale to customers.

loans.name: Mayis

texts.en:
Mayis is 48 years old and lives in Vanadzor city. He lives with his pensioner mother, his wife and two daughters. Mayis has a high pedagogical education and for more than 15 years has worked as a sports teacher in Vanadzor secondary schools. Because his teacher’s salary is low, he decided to run his own business in Vanadzor. 

More than one year ago Mayis started a pastry trading activity in the Lori area. He buys candies and cakes from wholesale markets, delivering and reselling it to food shops with his own car. With the profit from his business, Mayis is able to solve his family's needs and take care of his family better than some years ago. He would be very thankful to Kiva lenders if they lent him 500,000 AMD for increasing his merchandise assortment.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise assortment.
